title: Explained: The penalty that left Verstappen one point away from an F1 race ban
summary: The world champion was left furious after being asked to give up his position to Russell

qa_pairs.question: What is the consequence of a driver accumulating 12 penalty points on their super license within a 12-month period in Formula 1?
wrong_options: They are disqualified from the season.
They must start from the back of the grid.

qa_pairs.question: Which driver was involved in a position controversy with Max Verstappen in this incident?
What action can race stewards take if a driver is deemed to have violated racing rules?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: They can impose penalty points on the driver's super license.
wrong_options: They can award extra championship points.
They can require a driver to change their car setup.
They can impose time penalties that do not affect the race.
